page.title: 16GARAGE FACILITIES
page.content: There are 4 garages in the area.The Crossroads garage used to be a used car sales site with a sweet shop. Repairs to the cars sold there were carried out.Petrol and diesel were sold.One is now a disused site. Old mill garage was primarily for body work repairs.There was no sales of cars or fuel.At present Old mill garage is out of use.Masons garage used to sell petrol and diesel to the public, but this is now discontinued. From the garage a fleet of tankers is run carting bulkmilk from individual farmers to a central unit for the milk Marketing Board.
